data.title: I will never stay any where but here when I am in town!
data.text: This hotel is nice and quiet and the staff is great! Eric the manager is wonderful. We have stayed here a couple times and always have had a wonderful experience. It is obvious that Eric takes pride in this hotel and it shows. They treat you like family! They are very accommodating to special requests such as early check in or late check out. Breakfast is available in the morning at no charge. Nice TV, nice size fridge, microwave, desk, and couch in my room! Everything I needed and more for a VERY good rate per night. The housekeeping staff is also very accommodating and very nice! Thank you again to a Eric! We will be back!

data.title: OK stay, not really good nor very bad
data.text: The main complaint is that the king mattress was worn down, sagging in the middle, and not very soft. I like firmer mattresses, but this kept me up throughout the night. The breakfast offerings were very spartan, just skipped it as nothing was appealing. The price was good, as was the size of the TV, but other than that, there's nothing special about this unremarkable property.

data.title: Quick stay
data.text: We liked the place. Very clean and quiet. My wife would love softer sheets but overall worth it! We would stay again!

owner_response.author: , Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your positive feedback! We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Holloween weekend trip to Denver
data.text: The hotel was clean a smelled great the check in and check out process was quick and painless no hidden suprises on either end very quiet and comfy rooms with brand new mattresses the only complaint we had was our very last night the cable tv went out so we had no tv to watch other than that the stay was very pleasant.

owner_response.author: , Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your positive feedback! We are glad that you enjoyed your accommodations, and we hope to host you all again in the future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Lack of service or concern
data.text: I checked in on a late Ties night· At first glance great;  cheerful, clean and I loved my room. We left early Wed morning for a family memorial service to return late to discover the coffee/cream and sugar had not been replaced and my bed had not been made. I dealt with decaffeinated.Thursday we left early for family stuff and I did not return until late to discover the elevator broken. I have a muscle disease; stairs are slow and difficult. No effort was made to move or relocate. Finally got to my third floor room to discover my key cards did not work.I had also called during the day to ask that coffee be replenished in my room. It was not and again the bed was not touched. I called the next morning to ask for coffee supplies to be brought to my room and was told I could come downstairs and get some with the elevator still down!  I will say about the time I got my suitcase packed they rethought and brought me coffee but no cream/sugar. Would I recommend this place or return? Uh no.

owner_response.author: , Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We apologize about your negative experience. We hope that you will give us a second chance in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Terrible
data.text: The air conditioner was broken and the lock didn't work. Also, our sheets had stains all over it and the wallpaper was peeling. When we first called the front desk they said they were full, and then they hung up the second time. Won't be back at this location.

owner_response.author: , Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We apologize for your negative experience with us. We would have changed your sheets for you or offered you a new room if available. This does not excuse your experience in that room, but we hope that you give us another chance in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business
data.text: It was ok but my great.  I liked the personnel they were very nice. Breakfast had a lot to be desired .  Location was good for me

owner_response.author: , Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your positive feedback. We are looking to improve our breakfast options, so your suggestions are greatly appreciated! We hope to see you back soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: I get that it's a Days Inn but I did expect a clean room.
data.text: I know it's a Days Inn so my expectations were not high to begin with but I did expect to get a room that didn't look like it was falling apart. I found a stain on the light switch that I was able to clean off, brown stains which I can only imagine were rust, Falling tiles in the bathroom, water stains on the ceiling in the shower room and out by the sink, a hole behind the door where the knob went through, and a brown stain on the door near the toilet which I don't even want to think what it is. I cleaned these stains with a hotel towel and took them to the front desk to complain and they offered to clean the room to which I replied " I just cleaned it for you and my wife is going to be in bed all day with a migraine." The next morning at checkout I found the stain by the bathroom door which I cleaned and took to the front desk. I was upset that I had to do this in a room I was paying for and asked for a refund of at least one night to which the young lady replied she could do nothing for me because there was no manager. I called later that day to speak to a manger and was told that he was going to be out until Wednesday in meetings but that they would mention it to him and see what he says. Well a couple of hours later I get a call from the girl at the front desk saying the manager said no to my request and that if I wanted to I could call Wednesday and take it up with him.  My thought is that if this GM cared about his hotel, job, customer satisfaction, etc. He would have been the one to reach out to me instead of sending the girl to do his job. That being said, next time I will spend the extra money and go to a real hotel where they care about the customer and if I ever have this problem again I will take pictures and lt them clean their mess for themselves. If you can, pay a little more and stay some where clean and decent.

owner_response.author: , Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize that our hotel was not up to our brand standards. We are constantly making improvements to our hotel including the concerns you have made, so we greatly appreciate your suggestions. We hope that you will give us a second chance to see our improvements.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Need cleaning and upgrade
data.text:
Some front desk staff were very friendly.  Unfortunately, one person was very unwilling to honor the pet policy from the web site.  He did eventually honor it, but after he made me want to go stay somewhere else.

The place needs a good cleaning.

owner_response.author: , Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind remarks! I apologize about the confusion on our website about our pet policy. We will be fixing that for future guests. We are also going through renovations, so we hope you will come back and see us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Days Inn stay
data.text: Our stay was wonderful and our room was GREAT !!!!  The only complaint was the LATE start of breakfast. Every where else we stay breakfast starts at 6 am and everything is hot and ready. This Days Inn chose not to start until 6:30 am  and then nothing was hot (not even hot water for tea) and the hot cereal (we were told to put the cold oatmeal in the microwave !!)  So we had to eat out because we started work at 7am at the Veterans Hospital.

owner_response.author: Kim K, Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the feedback.  We will discuss the breakfast hours and see if changes can be made.  We value your feedback and utilize it to better serve our guests.  We hope to see you again in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: smelly
data.text: The room was dingy and smelled like stall smoke.  I asked not to be placed near the stairs and ice machine. Guesd where I was placed!  Staff was nuce and helpful. Tried to sign up for  Wyndham rewards and could not on the website. Had problems

owner_response.author: Kim K, Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for providing feedback about your stay at our hotel.  I apologize that you were put in the wrong area of the hotel and I hope that the desk agent was able to move you quickly.  I hope you were able to sign up for Wyndham Rewards, but if you were not, please call our hotel and we will be happy to set you up.

data.title: Smoked filled hallways
data.text: Customer service was pleasant, The hallways smelled like stale cigarette smoke. I will not stay there again and would like to have a refund!

owner_response.author: Kim K, Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Room needs new carpet and bathroom repair
data.text: The carpet was filthy. Looked liked it had not been deep cleaned in a long time. Many dark stains. This was an ADA room that I did not require. However, the wand shower head (only shower head available) was tied to a temporary wall mount by a plastic grocery bag.

owner_response.author: Kim K, Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review

data.text: The room smelled really bad, we think someone had smoked in it & they tried to cover up the smell. The breakfast was very poor & the oatmeal was cold and not even all the way cooked.

data.title: Terrible customer service, run down lobby/rooms, room smelled like smoke, not recommended
data.text: Arrived at 11:30PM Thursday evening and presented my drivers licence and credit card.  Front desk clerk makes photo copy of license and I ask why.  She states "It's their policy".  I ask for copy back or for her to black out personal information and she refuses.  I ask to have the copy back in the morning when I check out and she refuses.  She cannot tell my why this hotel needs to have a copy of the license other than it is the "policy".  The copy is stored in a non-secured location right on counter.  There is no documentation or notice that a copy of my drivers license is required to rent the room.  Call Wyndham customer service in the morning and they say they cannot contact the front desk to ask her to return copy.  I called police non-emergency number and a very nice deputy from the Centennial Police department helped me get the copy returned.  Of course, the front desk clerk was on the phone with the supervisor of the customer service agent I spoke to earlier.  So, apparently they CAN contact the front desk but only when it is to their benefit.  The lobby was run down and dingy.  There was a guest in the lobby on the phone with a bail bondsman in the computer/business center area.  The room smelled of smoke even though it was marked as non-smoking.  The rooms were also run down - peeling wallpaper, in dire need of paint, curtains hanging this way and that.  I did not stay for breakfast so I cannot comment but there was no coffee in either large dispenser at 7am.  I will never stay at this hotel and I will seriously consider whether to give Wyndham my business in the future.

owner_response.author: Kim K, Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dated and dirty
data.text: Staff was fair. Room basics were clean (sink, shower, bedding, toilets); however a deep cleaning was needed. The carpets were stained, questionable splatters in bathroom walls, pet urine odor, food particles on the counters and furniture. Location was convenient and there was ample parking.

owner_response.author: Kim K, Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the feedback.  We will make sure that these issues are addressed. We hope to see you again in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not Ever again
data.text: This place is a dump! And the management does not care! Talked with management tried to have him come to room to address my concerns he handed me a card and told me to email him pics ! Have been traveling across country for a month. Congrats Days Inn you have won my most horrible hotel stay!

owner_response.author: Kim K, Guest Relations Manager at Days Inn Englewood Denver Tech Center, responded to this review
